safire.learning.models.logistic_regression module¶

class safire.learning.models.logistic_regression.LogisticRegression(inputs, n_in, n_out, W=None, b=None, activation=<theano.tensor.nnet.nnet.Softmax object at 0x000000000B2306A0>, rng=<mtrand.RandomState object at 0x000000000C215168>)[source]¶

Bases: safire.learning.models.base_supervised_model.BaseSupervisedModel

A regression model with a mean squared loss error function.

error(y)[source]¶

Computes the regression mean squared error.

Parameters:y (theano.tensor.TensorType) – Corresponds to a vector that gives for each example the correct label.
Returns:The proportion of incorrectly classified instances.
Raises:TypeError
mean_squared_error(y)[source]¶
Compute the mean of the negative log-likelihood of the prediction

of this model under a given target distribution.

System Message: WARNING/2 ()

dvipng exited with error [stderr] c:\users\lenovo\appdata\local\temp\tmpnprari\math.dvi: No such file or directory [stdout] This is dvipng 1.13 Copyright 2002-2010 Jan-Ake Larsson

rac{1}{|\mathcal{D}|} mathcal{L} ( heta={W,b}, mathcal{D}) =

rac{1}{|\mathcal{D}|} sum_{i=0}^{|\mathcal{D}|} log(P(Y=y^{(i)}|x^{(i)}, W,b))
ell ( heta={W,b}, mathcal{D})

Note

We use the mean instead of the sum so that the learning rate is less dependent on the batch size.

type y:theano.tensor.TensorType
param y:Corresponds to a matrix of the desired output vectors.
returns:The mean of the squared error of the prediction against the true values.
